tender.title: Construction of road from NH-31C to Sijuguri via Chinamari by providing SDBC including 5 five nos. of RCC Box Culvert from Ch. 0.00 Km to 3.10 Km Length 3.10 Km of District Kokrajhar, Assam under CMs Goodwill Project for the year 2023-24. TN_26_25
